parts.name: Part 1
parts.text: You discover a mysterious time machine. Excited and curious, you decide to activate it.

parts.name: Part 2
parts.text: You find yourself in a bustling futuristic city. Advanced technology and flying cars fill the sky.

parts.name: Part 3
parts.text: You are now in ancient Egypt. The pyramids are being constructed, and people are going about their daily lives.

parts.name: Part 4
parts.text: While exploring the futuristic city, you discover a hidden laboratory with advanced gadgets.

parts.name: Part 5
parts.text: As you interact with the locals in ancient Egypt, you're mistaken for a deity. They invite you to a grand feast.

parts.name: Part 6
parts.text: In the laboratory, you find a device that allows you to control time. What do you want to do?

parts.name: Part 7
parts.text: The feast in ancient Egypt is extravagant. The locals worship you. What's your next move?

parts.name: Part 8
parts.text: Experimenting with time control goes wrong, creating a temporal anomaly. You're stuck between different eras.

parts.name: Part 9
parts.text: Revealing your true identity in ancient Egypt sparks a mix of awe and fear. The locals build a temple in your honor.

parts.name: Part 10
parts.text: Attempting to fix the anomaly proves challenging. You need to make a decision.

options.text: Seek help from the futuristic city's scientists

parts.name: Part 11
parts.text: The scientists in the futuristic city offer assistance. Together, you manage to stabilize the temporal anomaly.

parts.name: Part 12
parts.text: You explore more of the futuristic city, discovering advanced art and entertainment. It's a utopia.

options.text: Immerse yourself in the city's culture

parts.name: Good Ending
parts.text: Embracing the futuristic city's culture, you become an ambassador of peace and progress. Your time-traveling adventures end with a positive impact on civilizations.

parts.name: Bad Ending
parts.text: Unable to control the time anomaly, you're forever lost in a chaotic mix of eras. Your journey becomes an endless struggle against the unpredictable forces of time.
